mapper.select: SELECT QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_CLASS_NAME, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.DESCRIPTION, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.PREV_FIRE_TIME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.NEXT_FIRE_TIME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_STATE, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_TYPE, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.START_TIME, QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.CRON_EXPRESSION, QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TIME_ZONE_ID, QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS.REPEAT_INTERVAL, QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS.TIMES_TRIGGERED FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS ON QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME = QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_NAME AND QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP = QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP LEFT JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ON QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP LEFT JOIN QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS ON QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME = QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP = QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP
